did.unittitle: Miscellaneous and Personal - R to Z - Appointments, Positions: W. Thomas; E.E. Reed; Ex-Senator Taylor; W.B. Kennedy; H. C. Cross, F.M. Smith; J.B. Tomlinson; H. Carr, W. Thomas, E.E. Reed, etc. - Correspondence: Iroquois Club Invitation, W. Rothman, Chicago, IL - F.G. Stevenson Re: Paducah High School Award Presentation - W.B. Haldeman, Democratic National Member, 1884-90, 1918-20, Re: Appointment to State Finance Committee, Preference of Wealthy Farmer or Banker from 1st District, J.C. Utterback - E.E. Reed Appointment, Senator James, Senator Hollis - Blandville Homecoming Invitation - B.F. Stamps and Constituents Against War in Europe, Support of Gore Resolution, Re: Presidential Power to Participate in International Negotiations, World War I, Foreign Affairs; Need for Congress to Stand by the President at a Time of Grave International Crisis; Admonishment of the Legislative Branch - St. Louis Star, Barkley Biographical Sketch, 9 March 1916 - Letters by the Governor of Kentucky, A.O. Stanley; W.B. Kennedy Appointment - H.V. Sherrill Request Re: Value of Apple Orchard; A.W. Barkley Re: Green Ridge Orchards - A.E. Shoemaker, Anti-Saloon League Address - W.A. Sexton, A.W. Barkley Re: Election of the Democratic Campaign Committee Chairman - Colonel G.G. Singleton, A.W. Barkley Re: His Wish to Speak Out, W. Wilson for President - Emory University Law School Request for Support - City National Bank, J.C. Utterback, Cashier - Engagement Agency, Redpath-Vawter Chautauqua System, A.W. Barkley Request for a Series of Addresses on the Chautauqua Platform in 1917 - Jersey Camp, Woodmen of the World (WOW), Re: Regular Election to Be a Delegate - K. Wheeler, Re: C.E. Rice Testimony - General R.T. Wells, Woodmen of the World (WOW), A.W. Barkley Re: Encampment at Paris, TN; D. Kincheloe (Folder C)
